post.description: Generate backup codes for the current user. A new BackupCode verification record will be created in the current interaction.

200.description: Backup codes have been successfully generated.

verificationId.description: The unique verification ID of the newly created BackupCode verification record. This ID is required when adding the backup codes to the user profile via the Profile API.

404.description: The current interaction is not identified yet. All MFA verification records must be associated with a identified user.

post.description: Verify the provided backup code against the user's backup codes. A new BackupCode verification record will be created and marked as verified if the code is correct.

200.description: The backup code has been successfully verified.

verificationId.description: The unique verification ID of the BackupCode verification record.

404.description: The current interaction is not identified yet. All MFA verification records must be associated with a identified user.

400.description: The provided backup code is invalid.
